sentence.text: Mutations in cilium assembly lead to diseases ranging from isolated retinal degeneration to severe syndromic ciliopathies.
In this study, we created a mouse model of cilium assembly-associated retinal degeneration to investigate the ocular disease mechanism.

We investigated molecular mechanisms of degeneration and show that cilium assembly protein reduction leads to mislocalization of specific photoreceptor outersegment (OS) proteins (G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway, RP1, regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II), aberrant light-driven translocation of alpha transducin and altered localization of glioma-associated oncogene family member 1 (osteoblast differentiation).

sentence.text: This mouse model exhibits key features of the retinal phenotype observed in patients with cilium assembly-associated blindness and can be used for in vivo testing of ciliopathy therapies
